content: Combat sport events in 2021 ***ONE: Winter Warriors*** (also known as ***ONE 148: Eersel vs. Murtazaev***) was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on December 3, 2021, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background This event featured a kickboxing title fights. In the headline attraction, the reigning ONE Kickboxing Lightweight Champion [Regian Eersel](/wiki/Regian_Eersel) will defend his title for the fourth time against [Islam Murtazaev](/wiki/Islam_Murtazaev). The co-main event featured the atomweight women's grand prix final between [Stamp Fairtex](/wiki/Stamp_Fairtex) and [Ritu Phogat](/wiki/Ritu_Phogat). ## Results Main Card (YouTube / ONE Super App)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesLightweight Kickboxing[Regian Eersel](/wiki/Regian_Eersel) (c)def.[Islam Murtazaev](/wiki/Islam_Murtazaev)Decision (split)53:00[a]Women's Atomweight[Stamp Fairtex](/wiki/Stamp_Fairtex)def.[Ritu Phogat](/wiki/Ritu_Phogat)Submission (armbar)22:14[b]Bantamweight Kickboxing[Hiroki Akimoto](/wiki/Hiroki_Akimoto)def.[Qiu Jianliang](/wiki/Qiu_Jianliang)Decision (unanimous)33:00LightweightDagi Arslanalievdef.[Timofey Nastyukhin](/wiki/Timofey_Nastyukhin)TKO (punches)30:49Heavyweight[Marcus Almeida](/wiki/Marcus_Almeida)def.Kang Ji WonSubmission (rear-naked choke)12:27Flyweight[Yuya Wakamatsu](/wiki/Yuya_Wakamatsu)def.Hu YongDecision (unanimous)35:00 ## Bonus awards The following fighters were awarded bonuses: - **MMA Fight of the Year 2021:** Dagi Arslanaliev vs. [Timofey Nastyukhin](/wiki/Timofey_Nastyukhin) - **$50,000 Performance of the Night:** Dagi Arslanaliev, [Timofey Nastyukhin](/wiki/Timofey_Nastyukhin) - Martial Arts portal - [2021 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2021_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE: Winter Warriors
